channel.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
channel.description:
I saw that Freeman's Mind episode, and I have finished the game.
He thinks "that's either a really exotic bird, or the souls of the damned begging to be released from the neverending agony" or some shit like that.
Im kyuriouse

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: Wasad
item.description:
In on a rail, near the bottom of the rocket there is a loud scream. First time i played HL it scared the shit out of me and after looking in the room with tons of gibs, i ran back to the tram and drove as fast as possible away from this place.

I never went to this place again.

First i thought it’s just the scream of the soldiers who died there. But after thinking about that this sounds are also on XEN i don’t know anymore. In my opinion, they are the remaining sounds of an cut Story. Maybe they wanted to add an beta monster in this chapter, but they cut it out. So they left the sounds there because of the atmosphere.

Read full topic
item.source: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
nietzschesaurus:

i love the tiny bits of hp lovecraft influence you find through HL1. i definitely consider the game to be in the realm of cosmic horror.

Yeah me too. Thus my name, haha.

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

at Nihilanths portal you hear scientists and guards saying something like “big day today” something like that you should think Nihilanth can steal souls

Isn’t that a miss match of tons of different sound effects you’ve heard muddled over each other? It love it. It really does give a feeling of “This is it”.

Isn’t it like, the eye of Xen or something?

Read full topic
item.source: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
taxi_evil:

It is odd, I never knew what they were. Didn’t sound like people screaming, I think it’s just a sound effect. It did its job, I found it unnerving

Same for me.

Read full topic
item.source: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
higgsboson:

Those are the sounds of the Tentacle dyeing. They probably thought it was cool so they put them in On A Rail and maybe in other parts of the game as well.

Sounds similar but yet is different:
Tentacle Sound & On A Rail Screams

I love these ambient noises

Read full topic

item.source: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?

item.title: What are those weird screams in On a Rail?
item.dc:creator: G-Rona
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Those are sounds from Left 4 Dead, I believe. Ross Scott just added them for the creepy aspect; they weren’t in the original game.

Actually, no. Those sounds actually were in Half-life, but they were remixed into one in L4D.

When the Infected are summoned in the finales you hear a scream from them. That sound is a mix of two sounds that can be found in the Half-Life sound folder called “the_horror1” and “the_horror2”.

Source: https://left4dead.wikia.com/wiki/Common_Infected , the “Notes” section

Read full topic
